# defi-agents

> DeFi agent definitions JSON API + MCP - Production-ready agents for Web3, crypto trading, portfolio management, and blockchain automation. MCP compatible.

## Overview

defi-agents is an open-source project by nirholas. DeFi agent definitions JSON API + MCP - Production-ready agents for Web3, crypto trading, portfolio management, and blockchain automation. MCP compatible.

## Repository

- URL: https://github.com/nirholas/defi-agents
- Language: TypeScript
- License: MIT
- Author: nirholas

## Contributing

Contributions are welcome. See CONTRIBUTING.md for guidelines.
